caption.p: Ferrous ions (Fe 2+) chelating activity of V. officinalis extracts. Values are expressed as the mean ± SD (n = 3). Vo-in vivo— V. officinalis parent plant grown in vivo-herb extract; Vo-C— V. officinalis callus culture extract; Vo-S— V. officinalis suspension culture extract; Vo-STB— V. officinalis stirred-tank bioreactor culture extract; EDTA—Ethylenediaminetetraacetic acid.
